description: At Italian Restaurant, we serve classic Italian dishes made with fresh ingredients. Our menu features traditional pasta dishes and grilled meats.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, our main courses are prepared with authentic Italian flavors.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A photo of a traditional lasagna with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A photo of sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
